thread.title: The Cynja Partners with FARRAGO COMICS to Offer a New Comic Book Promoting Cyber Safety for Kids
thread.title_full: The Cynja Partners with FARRAGO COMICS to Offer a New Comic Book Promoting Cyber Safety for Kids - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Cynja Partners with FARRAGO COMICS to Offer a New Comic Book Promoting Cyber Safety for Kids
text:
The Cynja
WASHINGTON , Sept. 30, Multi-platform media company, The Cynja ® , announces the launch of its new comic book series on the Farrago Comics App.
DOWNLOAD the App at:
iPad: http://bit.ly/FARRAGOiPad Android: http://bit.ly/FARRAGOandroid Using the original characters and storyline of their graphic novel series, The Cynja is a full-color digital comic book written by Chase Cunningham , Heather C. Dahl and illustrated by Shirow Di Rosso and is based on their expertise as techies and parents. The comics inspire kids of all ages to make smart choices online and learn about Internet safety as they navigate their digital lives.
"We're thrilled to be a part of the Farrago Comics world," said Heather C. Dahl , CEO of The Cynja LLC. "Like our mission at The Cynja, Farrago Comics is transforming people's understanding of technology. Their digital distribution platform empowers original series like The Cynja to share our story and the joy of comics with millions of new readers, something that wasn't possible only a few years ago."
"We are very excited to be working with The Cynja team," said Matty Ryan , Chief Creative Officer of Farrago Comics. "With technology advancing so quickly, cyber safety for kids should be a part of everyone's thought process. We are looking forward to helping spread The Cynja and their inspirational stories on the Farrago Comics platform."
The Cynja comic series, supported by a sponsorship from managed secure cloud leader Armor, has been recognized by PBS NewsHour, the Guardian, Children's Book Review, HelpNet Security, PC Magazine, Savvy Auntie, the National Press Foundation, Holland's Kennisnet, Australia's Mouth of Mums and the former inspector general for the NSA.
"Our goal is to transport Farrago Comics' fans deep into the virtual reality we now live by weaving creativity into an understanding of the impact digital innovation has on our daily lives, society and world," said Chase Cunningham , CTO of The Cynja LLC. "When we use the Internet each of us enters a virtual world wherein forces of immense magnitude battle for power. Like the ancient myths and the imagined tales of fantasy and science fiction, this cyber darkness is filled with a new generation of monsters-zombies, worms, botnets and more. But there is one, critical difference; these monsters are real."
About The Cynja ®
Co-founders Heather C. Dahl and Dr. Chase Cunningham , along with Creative Director Shirow Di Rosso , started bringing cyberspace to life for kids of all ages by publishing their first book The Cynja ® Volume 1 based on their professional experience in tech and cybersecurity. In just two years, The Cynja has grown into a book series published in English and Dutch, a regular comic strip, activity books, blog, subscription newsletter and children's workshops all designed to help families make smart digital choices. This fall they will be releasing Code of The Cynja ® Volume 2, offering a Spanish translation of Volume 1, and launching a new app to help protect kids online called CynjaSpace™. The Cynja LLC is based in Washington, DC . Learn more by visiting www.thecynja.com
About FARRAGO Comics
Farrago Comics is a new digital publishing model that connects the top independent creators of comic books with comic fans through a single digital platform by providing free top quality content. This new model for comics and graphic novels replaces long-standing reader and creator barriers inherent in the current pay-per-book model with one that is ad-supported, similar to several familiar ones in music and video. Farrago is providing fans with the free comics they crave and allowing creators to focus on their passion while making a good living. http://farragocomics.com
For more information contact:
Helen Garneau
Director of Marketing
The Cynja ® LLC
helen.garneau@thecynja.com
